Name: MPI_Aint_diff
Description: MPI_Aint_diff calculates the difference between two addresses. As the standard states, "the resulting address is valid only at the process that generated addr1 and addr2, and addr1 and addr2 must correspond to locations in the same object in the same process".

Parameters.Name: addr_1
Parameters.Description: The address from which will be subtracted the address contained in the second parameter.

Parameters.Name: addr_2
Parameters.Description: The address to subtract from the address passed as the first parameter.

Return.Description: The difference between the two addresses.
